description: This file defines the OceanTheme class which provides theme configuration and helper functions for a Flutter application's UI. It includes color palette constants, a method to build a ThemeData object, and a widget for gradient headers.

classes.name: OceanTheme
classes.description: A utility class defining color constants, theme building method, and a gradient header widget for a Flutter app following the Ocean style theme.

methods.name: buildTheme
methods.description: Builds and returns a ThemeData object configured with colors, shapes, and component styles for the Ocean theme.

methods.name: gradientHeader
methods.description: A static widget method that wraps a child widget with a Container decorated with a linear gradient background, suitable for headers or app bars.
